txt.en: Your eye is drawn west and north across the map, beyond the borders of Rohan, and comes to rest upon the pastoral quiet of the Shire. You wonder what has become of Halros since he elected to remain behind and watch the borders of that land.
Your mind wanders as you contemplate the fate of Halros and the Shire.
As you study the contours of Gléowine's map, your mind is drawn to wonder what has befallen Halros in the weeks since he elected to remain behind, in the Shire.
Study Gléowine's map and complete 'Interlude: Halros's Watch'
Your mind travels far as you study the map, musing on the fate of Halros and the Shire.
